name: Chloe Gong
bio: no. 1 new york times and internationally bestselling author of some angsty books

social_posts.post_text: didn’t have candles so I turned 24 wishing on a lighter, how very juliette of me
summertime in the vineyard or whatever it was lana del rey said

it’s 2023 which means it’s the year of ☎️Last Violent Call☎️!!! (and Immortal Longings. and Foul Lady Fortune’s sequel. but I digress because we have the rest of the year to talk about those other two)

for UK readers (and for everyone else who wants to rob UK stock haha jk unless…?) the @waterstones exclusive edition is now live for pre-order, featuring this foil design on the naked hardcover *underneath* the jacket ❤️‍🔥 

as a reminder, the UK version of Last Violent Call comes as one hardcover book with the two novellas together while the US version comes as a box-set with two novellas as separate hardcovers. they’re both very gorgeous, you can’t go wrong with whichever one you choose but if you want the Waterstones exclusive make sure to preorder as there’s limited stock!! there’s one option for just the exclusive foil cover and there’s another option for the book to be ✨signed✨ as well (limited to one per customer)

ok gtg now I need to finish signing these pages so they can bind them in 😜

it’s a ✨LAUNCH EVENT✨!

Last Violent Call will be out in the world at the end of next month and there’s a party at @bnunionsqnyc to celebrate… and by party I mean you can join me in conversation with @tashiebhuiyan while we air out all the secrets behind these novellas 👀

Link is in my bio, make sure to snatch your ticket if you’re in NYC😎 it includes the books AND a very gorgeous sticker AND how could we forget the opportunity to look me in the eye and cry to my face, as so many of you have promised you will do

If you’re not in NYC (or nearby enough) you can still click the link for a ✨shipped book only✨ option where I’ll sign your copy and B&N will get it into your hands🫡🫶🏻

I’m so excited for these novellas to be in the world soon, they’re truly a passion project from the very depths of my heart and I’m so grateful I get to publish something that can wholly be described as domestic fluff 🥹 (don’t get used to it though we’re heading straight back to angst with Immortal Longings in July)

hope to see your lovely faces soon❤️

p.s. I definitely did not edit out a red solo cup in my hand. I was definitely actually holding the book at the time of this picture. thank u.
sorry for the december delay, I was on my mid-season hiatus

SWIPE FOR A SNEAK PEEK

the time has finally come, These Violent Delights is releasing in paperback! 

it feels like forever ago that I debuted with this firstborn child and went everywhere with my “It’s Romeo and Juliet by way of The Godfather in 1920s Shanghai” pitch (seriously, I think I started saying that line in my sleep) so right as we’re wrapping up the Secret Shanghai universe with FLF2 it’s really nice that we get to make the very beginning accessible in a new format too🥹 (in the US, that is, I know the UK has their paperback already😉)

AND as you might have realized if you swiped first, all editions of the US paperback will come with Roma’s letters to Juliette… some delivered, some undelivered 😶 there will ALSO be a Barnes & Noble Exclusive Paperback Edition with some bonuses but hold tight for more info 🫢

mark your calendars for May 30th!!!✨✨✨

icymi: Roma’s letters coming to a paperback near you* on May 30th, 2023

*only from my US publisher, and if you’re not in the US you can still purchase/preorder this edition from places like Book Depository for free shipping or amazing independent bookstores like @astoriabookshop which do international shipping + signed/personalized 💌 just make sure it’s from @simonteen (aka it should say the publisher is Margaret K. McElderry Books) if you want the bonus letters!

6 months until Immortal Longings hits shelves so it’s time for some ✨art✨, commissioned from @kitsukkit 🫶🏻

meet Calla Tuoleimi and Anton Makusa: the outlaw and the exile, or alternatively the nightmare sagittarius + scorpio pairing (are there star signs in this 90s-inspired urban fantasy world? no. but the sheer destructiveness of sag and scorpio together transcends universes imo so that’s how I’m going to describe them)

because this is my adult debut after swimming in the YA space, please be aware that Immortal Longings is written for a different target audience in mind and won’t have the same tone as the Secret Shanghai books!! Calla and Anton are 23 and 25 years old respectively so expect what you might expect from a R-rated film. they try to kill each other very aggressively on their first meeting. like immediate-sword-in-chest level attempted murder. this isn’t these violent delights, this is these violent grown maniacs are either going to tear each other apart or the city around them🫡

(also a little birdy—ahem, my publisher—told me UK cover reveal soon)

it’s Immortal Longings, but ✨exclusive✨(that we can reveal so far😙)

the Barnes & Noble edition features exclusive in-world bonus content and the Indigo edition features an exclusive foreword and this ❗️alternate❗️cover… if you want it on your doorstep the moment these hit shelves July 25th I have FABULOUS NEWS FOR YOU Indigo is currently running a 30% off presale promotion for Most Anticipated SFF titles from now until Feb 5th and Immortal Longings is included

📕 🏃🏻‍♀️💨(that’s me if I were a Canadian with access to Indigo pre-sales)
Come back tOmorrow eVening on london timE, see you theRe

it’s here!!! the UK cover of Immortal Longings in all its glory!!!

cover illustration by the incredibly talented @coreybrickleyillustration and art direction by @lydiablagden 🥰

I am genuinely obsessed with how wong kar-wai esque this cover is, it captures the 90s fantasy vibe perfectly and I can’t wait to see how it’s going to look in physical form, you’ll definitely want to preorder to get your hands on one (because there’s even more beautifulness on the back hehe)

I know we’ve been in “Untitled (Foul Lady Fortune #2)” purgatory for a hot second but soon… maybe Thursday… maybe around 11AM EST… you will know the title, you will know the release day, you will know the description to the final book of the Secret Shanghai universe 😈 

and maybe if you look really closely, you can guess the title before then? 😶

I promised more info to come on the B&N Exclusive Edition of the These Violent Delights paperback, and the time hath arrived to bring you the goods 👹

now available for preorder, the exclusive edition comes with an alternate cover, a GORGEOUS art print by @artbysmashley for the step-back cover (as shown in the video), and a series of flashback vignettes featuring Roma & Juliette from when they were 15 and happy — if you’ve been wondering why the “A RomaJuliette Christmas Special” has disappeared from my website, it’s because they were edited to take new printed form here, you can swipe for a sneak peek 😙

the B&N edition will also include Roma’s letters as those will be in every U.S. paperback! mark your calendars for May 30th (or preorder and forget about it until this shows up on your doorstep hehehehe)

WHEEEE TITLE REVEAL👹

the grand finale to the Secret Shanghai universe is coming September 26th—preorder links are live from your favorite US or ANZ retailer so you can secure your copy now if you so desire 🥹🫶🏻 (hold tight for UK + int’l links!) thank you for loving these characters and joining me on the adventure, this 500+ page monstrosity is everything I could hope to do in wrapping up this world, and I’m so excited for everyone to read it ❤️

✨ OFFICIAL DESCRIPTION: ✨

Winter is drawing thick in 1932 Shanghai, as is the ever-nearing threat of a Japanese invasion.

Rosalind Lang has suffered the worst possible fate for a national spy: she’s been exposed. With the media storm camped outside her apartment for the infamous Lady Fortune, she’s barely left her bedroom in weeks, plotting her next course of action after Orion was taken and his memories of Rosalind wiped. Though their marriage might have been a sham, his absence hurts her more than any physical wound. She won’t rest until she gets him back.

But with her identity in the open, the task is near impossible. The only way to leave the city and rescue Orion is under the guise of a national tour. It’s easy to convince her superiors that the countryside needs unity more than ever, and who better than an immortal girl to stir pride and strength into the people?

When the tour goes wrong, however, everything Rosalind once knew is thrown up in the air. Taking refuge outside Shanghai, old ghosts come into the open and adversaries turn to allies. To save Orion, they must find a cure to his mother’s traitorous invention and take this dangerous chemical weapon away from impending foreign invasion—but the clock is ticking, and if Rosalind fails, it’s not only Orion she loses, but her nation itself.
opened the first page of my uk author copies and started crying from how cute my grown 24-year-old children are

Last Violent Call is on shelves in ONE WEEK AND ONE DAY so it’s time for a final copies unboxing 😙 these two novellas are truly the most fluffy and wholesome projects I’ve ever had the pleasure of doing, I’m so excited for everyone to read them in preparation for Foul Heart Huntsman 🏹 if you’re in NYC, you can grab a ticket to join us at B&N Union Square for its launch, or if you’re elsewhere and still want my signature scribbled across the page, Astoria Bookshop is still taking preorders for personalized orders!!!

there are four (4!!!) days until Last Violent Call, just like the amount of years Rosalind spends blaming herself for— *gunshot noise*

since the author copies of the beautiful boxset are here, I’m doing a ✋🏻giveaway✋🏻 of ten signed copies to celebrate impending almost-release!!! 

Last Violent Call should be read between Foul Lady Fortune and Foul Heart Huntsman, with Roma & Juliette’s novella taking place in September 1931 and Benedikt & Marshall’s novella taking place in January 1932… so yes you can go into it for a glimpse of domestic post-canon life if you’re only caught up with the original duology but the events in LVC serve to set up for the grand finale to come 👁👁

to enter the giveaway, comment an emoji that represents your reaction to the ending to Foul Lady Fortune AND you get a bonus entry if you can recreate your reaction in a story/reel and tag me 🫶🏻

10 winners will be chosen on Monday, open int’l!!!

back in september 2021, I texted @tashiebhuiyan “listening to my tears ricochet what if I did romajuliette healing novella to loop them into FLF2” …and thus the first part of Last Violent Call was conceived (yes I was musing about this before most people had even read Our Violent Ends, I may create Evil but I also create Good, it’s the duality of man)

Last Violent Call is a passion project through and through, something I would have been content to write for myself even if we never got it published—but then my agent greenlit it with excitement, then my editor + publisher greenlit it with excitement, and so now we’re bringing it to you, the readers, as well

four years have passed since the explosion that rocked Shanghai: Roma and Juliette are living a quiet life in a small township, Benedikt and Marshall are at peace together in Moscow. then news comes from Shanghai. Rosalind is in trouble, and if they’re to save Orion, help is needed—and fast… which makes these novellas sound like they have a plot, I know, and they kinda do, but at the heart of it, they’re also 240 pages of the quiet sort of happiness that comes with love

Last Violent Call is now on shelves wherever books are sold, and I hope you enjoy❤️

thank you for welcoming the arrival of my twins (aka the two novellas) the birthing process was very healthy and tender (aka I loved seeing everyone’s gorgeous faces at launch and I can’t wait for your reactions when reading I love you all so much ❤️)

it’s time… Foul Heart Huntsman has a cover and the Secret Shanghai universe is coming to a close… 🫀🏹

I can’t even articulate how cool it is to see these covers all laid out together with a perfect color gradient—we didn’t know what was coming when the design team was putting together These Violent Delights and yet everything has worked out for a connected series of covers going from dark to light in the background and light to dark in the text, it’s just so symbolic for the crux of these stories and I’m *clenches fist* about it 🫡

Thank you to @gizmodo for doing the exclusive reveal, as well as a Chapter 1 sneak peek which you can click the link in bio to read!!! 📖 the gorgeous art is by @skeevaa + design by the wonderful S&S team🫀

(and in case anyone is wondering, the traditional Chinese character on this cover is 獵, which means “to hunt” 😉)
“today is definitely the day I get those disposable cameras from nye developed,” chloe said for two months straight until it finally happened

UK ARCs are here!!! I’m obsessed with this version to an unhealthy degree, in which I mean I’ve just been patting the cover ever since I opened the envelope that sent these to me 🫶🏻

we have just under four months to go until Immortal Longings in the world and idk maybe some plots are being plotted for me to touch my hands on as many copies of Immortal Longings (UK Version) as possible 🤔

[COVER REVEAL] “Ces plaisirs violents” de Chloe Gong sera disponible en librairie au mois de juin 2023 ! 🥀🏮

Hier, lors de l’annonce de “Ces plaisirs violents”, nous vous avions promis un écrin sublime à l’image de son intrigue sensationnelle et de ses fabuleux personnages et nous tenons parole. Vous pouvez donc admirer l’édition reliée et notre première révélation sur celle-ci : de merveilleuses tranches teintées avec motifs. Mais nous vous réservons encore de très belles surprises ! 😉 

Nous reviendrons bien sûr vers vous très prochainement pour l’ouverture officielles des précommandes ! 👀

Traduit par Jacques Collin, ”Ces plaisirs violents” de Chloe Gong sera disponible au mois de Juin chez Sabran en édition reliée collector, en broché et en e-book ! 🥀🏮

Restez connecté•e•s et n’hésitez pas à repartager cette info, cela nous aide énormément. 🤗🥰
this is how I want everyone to look when they reach the end of this book (at a complete and utter loss) (aka me all the time)
heard a rumour that my runaway gangster children were hiding just outside the city and went to go find them (exclusive real-time photo of them on the last slide)

okay TECHNICALLY this wasn’t Zhouzhuang, it was a neighbouring ancient township but you know what, the vibes are similar enough that I give you permission to envision this frame by frame when reading/re-reading the novella

as local legend juliette cai once said: “you know me… running around. living life. eating soup dumplings”

and as local legend juliette cai also once did (sort of), I’m hopping on a plane today and returning to New York (but because I need to get back to work, not because my lover blew up my house)

the last time I was in Shanghai was January 2020, before I knew how the love letters I had written to this city would be received, before I knew if readers out there would care about a 1920s alternate history here… so I’m glad I’ve finally made my way back just before the final instalment of that world releases. weird!!!!! the passage of time!!!!! but finishing one thing means I’m simmering on the next thing I’m going to write so… ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ stay tuned 😛

Foul Heart Huntsman ARCs are [takes deep breath] HEREEEEE 🏹

sneak peeks to come as we get closer to release… I thought about taking a picture of a page but, you know, there are still five months until September 26th so I can’t feed you this early 😋

HOWEVER I will do an early giveaway of one signed copy for someone out there to get the whole meal at once 🍽 To enter 1) make sure you have FHH added to your TBR on whichever platform of your choice, yes written in a notebook counts too, 2) comment your fave flower, and I’ll choose a winner next week 🫀

did you know there are only 27 days until These Violent Delights releases in paperback in the US and therefore there are only 27 days until you can read the bonus letters included in every copy????? not to give you whiplash or anything going from the 24 year olds in the novella to the 15 year olds writing letters but I AM in fact going to give you emotional whiplash because I wrote one of the letters and stared at a wall for two hours. it’s that sort of bonus content 🤪

the art is by Sonia who is not on social media but you can support them on ko-fi.com/starz !!! it was originally posted alongside the “romajuliette christmas special” which many people have noticed is no longer online… and that’s because it’s going to be printed in the Barnes & Noble Exclusive Edition of this paperback, which is also coming with a silver cover and MORE ART beneath it (not pictured here, but you can scroll a little on my profile to find Ashley’s masterpiece)

I’m very excited for These Violent Delights to be in paperback at last, if you want a signed and personalized copy you can order through Astoria Bookshop as always, or idk, camp out at a bookstore in New York on May 30th I guess you’re bound to spot me sooner or later

I may be delirious from 20 hours in the air but I have landed in the southern hemisphere and I’m kind of struggling to remember I can stop faking an american accent now when requesting a water (wohdah)

🦘COME SEE ME AT THE BRISBANE WRITERS FESTIVAL!!!🦘I’ll be doing panels on Thurs 11 and Fri 12 + a signing after each. while Saturday’s event is sold out already, I’ll be hanging around for Love YA Day—with one (1) ARC of Foul Heart Huntsman to give out 🫀(you can rest assured that the requirement to get it will be to say something very nice about New Zealand. 🔫australian-only requirement, instructions tbd)

🥝 ALSO I WILL BE AT THE AUCKLAND WRITERS FESTIVAL NEXT WEEK!!!🥝 sweet-talk your teachers into bringing you to the Schools Programme where I’ll be presenting on Wed 17 + Thurs 18 + signing after, or come to my panel on Fri 19, or come to my ~masterclass~ on Sat 20 (more info online at writersfestival.co.nz)

anyway I’m going to go pass out now, can’t wait to see u all xoxo

graphic design is my passion

and IMMORTAL LONGINGS is coming out a week early in the US!!! if you’ve marked your calendars for July 25th scribble that out and mark July 18th instead. but if you’re over in the UK don’t scribble it out because it’s still July 25th there. for reasons. great reasons we will all find out about soon.

this officially means we’ve got less than ✨two months✨ to go until Antony & Cleopatra meets Clove & Cato in a 90s Wong Kar-wai film (listen I know this is a really niche intersection of an elevator pitch but bear with me I swear it makes sense)‼️ preorder is available from all your fave retailers and u want to preorder to get the shiniest copy from the factory line 😙😙😙

bringing you Immortal Longings… on ✨tour✨!!! 🗡🩸

I’m ridiculously excited that I get to hop into these stores across the US and bring the first book of this trilogy into the world—seeing readers’ faces and getting to actually grasp hands with people in the flesh realm is my favorite part of being an author (not to sound weird) so I’m Ready 🤝

all events are ticketed so please make sure to grab yours ahead of time!!! 💃🏻 you can follow the link in my bio to buy tickets for your location, or go to Events on my website 🤓

there’s more info to come on my Comic Con events (😈) and more info to come about… other… possible… places… to tour in the flesh realm… 😁
I’ve been sleeping so long in a 20-year dark night

These Violent Delights is now on shelves in PAPERBACK!!! 

at long last, you can experience the story in floppy form and hug the book to your chest without getting stabbed by sharp edges (hopefully)

ALL paperbacks come with the bonus content of Roma’s letters, just make sure it’s the US edition 💌 available for order from all your favorite retailers, and then wander down the tissue aisle because I packed the letters full of angst 

the pictured silver copies are the @barnesandnoble Exclusive Edition, which in addition to the letters, comes with a Christmas prequel story at the back and a gorgeous art print at the front 💕 I’m so so excited this is finally in the world—✨enjoy✨!

I never could have imagined that plopping down and writing These Violent Delights would mean I get to travel the world and see so many people and experience whole cities in bite-sized outings during festivals but I couldn’t be more grateful 🥹🫶🏻 

biggest thank you to my publisher @leya_portugal for having me, and thank you to everyone who came along to the Lisbon Book Fair!!! get excited because Immortal Longings will be coming in translation this year too, and there are all sorts of fun plans in the works 🗡📕📗

I’m so excited because I love mess

40 days until Immortal Longings is on shelves so here’s a snippet 🫶🏻

Immortal Longings is my adult debut because it’s my mess book… we’ve got Calla who’s entered a city-wide battle to the death because she wants to kill the king and we’ve got Anton who’s entered the same battle to win money and save Otta, his childhood love in a coma. then Calla and Anton agree to work together to speed up the games and instead spiral into a bout of codependency despite the fact that neither can achieve their goal without killing the other and ✨voila✨… mess. 

you can preorder to secure ur extremely shiny copy ahead of release or if you’re from new york or western massachusetts or st louis or san diego or seattle or colorado or decatur I will be coming to u on ✨tour✨ which you can grab a ticket for 👀👀👀 (all info on my website under Events)

The end is near... but don't expect a "happy ever after".

"Kenikmatan yang kejam ini berakhir kejam pula. Dari dulu kau sendiri tahu."

Sekuel These Violent Delights karya Chloe Gong. Diterjemahkan oleh Reni Indardini. Desain sampul oleh Pinahayu Parvati. Segera terbit: Our Violent Ends edisi bahasa Indonesia! 🤍🔥🥀

happy ✨ONE MONTH✨ until Immortal Longings releases worldwide!!!

casual reminder that 1) the first print run of the UK edition from @hodderscape will have this jaw-dropping endpaper art by @coreybrickleyillustration (first slide)

and 2) the @barnesandnoble exclusive of the US edition from @sagasff will have this glorious endpaper art by @unusualco (second slide)

I will accept being yelled at if you are tempted to buy both, I know they’re going to be works of art to decorate your shelf🫡❤️ 

make sure you plop your preorders in to guarantee your copy!!! I will not be yelled at if stock runs out!!!

ok can’t wait yay xoxo

announcing…✨UK TOUR✨!!! 

much more information to come, but I’m so excited that the news is out and I’ll be hopping across the atlantic to see your faces in August ✈️

there will be stops in London, Bath, Birmingham, Liverpool, Newcastle, and Norwich, and I’m willing to sign however big a stack you can carry but all events are ticketed so I’d highly recommend securing your copy of the Waterstones Exclusive of Immortal Longings (three words: gold sprayed edges)

the Events page on my website has updated with ticket links, and hold tight for more London information! 😙
You can’t blame us ✨🫶 @thechloegong

sometimes a relationship is just an assassin + her brother’s best friend unknowingly obsessed with her secret identity idk 

🧪 Foul Lady Fortune spoilers, scroll now if you don’t want to be spoiled 🧪

Originally the bonus short story at the back of the B&N/Indigo Exclusive Edition of Foul Lady Fortune, we’re now bringing The Priest and the Shepherd to you for free via @simonteen !!! Though it is a prequel story set long before the events of Foul Lady Fortune, it’s the very start of Phoebe as Priest so you can understand why it was placed *after* the last page of the book 😉

This isn’t required reading before Foul Heart Huntsman, but it’ll elevate the experience when the final book comes and the cat-and-mouse game between Priest and Shepherd finally has to draw to a conclusion…. 🪤

the short story is now live on simonteen.com, so get ready before Foul Heart Huntsman drops September 26th!!!

yes I did drop these heavy books as soon as the camera took its burst, I have weak noodle arms

since this is a question that’s come up a few times I just wanted to do a lil reminder that you can ✨always✨ get signed/personalized copies of my books from @astoriabookshop ‼️‼️‼️

that includes orders of These Violent Delights, Our Violent Ends, Foul Lady Fortune, or Last Violent Call that are already released, or signed preorders of Foul Heart Huntsman or Immortal Longings… yes you can request little doodles or song lyrics in the order notes, and yes I do sit there fulfilling each one of them even when you get me to draw roma doing cartwheels

all links are on my website or just pop over to the Astoria Bookshop website ➕ put your orders in for signed/doodled Immortal Longings asap especially if you want one because we have 19 more days to go and that’ll ensure you get ur copy shipped for release wheeeeeee 🤸‍♀️

Immortal Longings comes out in one week which sounds EXTREMELY FAKE???

my official author copies should be arriving any day now (👁👁) which means it’s giveaway time for these two ARCs that need new homes!!! to enter, make sure you’re following + comment your weapon of choice in a city-wide death match, I’ll choose two winners in 24 hours 🤓

the Immortal Longings tour hits the US and the UK very very soon, make sure you grab your ticket asap if you want to come to an event as they’re going fast! I promise I’m very entertaining, I’ll even do backflips as my grand entrance for each event (metaphorically)

IMMORTAL LONGINGS IS OUT TODAYYY 🫶🏻

this is my fifth book and my first adult novel, with both US and UK editions cradled in my arms as a beautiful child whose guts were conceptualized during winter break of senior year when I was left in isolation to dream about a dense, heaving 90s noir city… and San-Er came to life

Immortal Longings is an Antony & Cleopatra fantasy retelling with a hearty dash of Wong Kar-wai and Battle Royale, but really, it’s about Calla and Anton’s spiral into each other—it’s about power, obsession, love… and everything in between

I hope you enjoy the games, and remember: the only way to win (the reading experience), is to survive (have fun and prepare for the next two books in the trilogy 😚) 

xoxo

(ALSO COME SEE ME ON TOUR IF YOU WANT A MAO MAO DOODLE)
@thechloegong’s adult epic fantasy debut, IMMORTAL LONGINGS, is finally here!! We can’t wait for you to get your hands on it! 📖

🌙SAN DIEGO COMIC CON APPEARANCES!!!🌙

here is the official list of all the places you can find me tomorrow to hear me chatter about books or get all your books signed!!!

AND for the YA besties, there will be an ARC drop of Foul Heart Huntsman at 9:30AM at the Simon & Schuster booth 1128 with @simonteen !!! 🫀🏹

also if you see me wandering the show floor, please say hi!!! I… don’t have any merch to give out because I’m mid-tour and my suitcase is bursting but I will sign foreheads if desired 🫶🏻

wild!!! literally wild!!!!!!!!

I knew from the very beginning of the Immortal Longings pub journey that I was but a debut tadpole coming to swim in the big kids’ pond (aka the very vast adult publishing space) so it is mind-blowing to end release week on the New York Times bestsellers AAAAAAA!!! number 14!!!!

the most superstar team birthed this book into the world and I’m making the most intense heart eyes at everyone at Saga/Gallery!!! also my agent @lauraecrock is the BIGGEST star (you’ll see her in the front page dedication😉) plus @amara.books @laurcarr @joemountains have been the most dazzling dazzlers shining on this book 🥹 thank you all, and thank you to the gorgeous wonderful beautiful readers who have picked up a copy and are entering this world with me that has lived in my head for so long. it is an honor to write for you and it will always be an honor for however long you’ll have me 🫶🏻

seven cities and one comic con later…

somehow I took so many photos during tour and yet I have NOTHING to post so please accept this cobbled-together photo dump 🤲🏻 each bookstore gets a big kiss on the forehead from me (metaphorically) in gratitude over their wonderful work in hosting these events

I will now be sleeping for a whole week!!!! once again thank u to the gorgeous faces who came along and special shoutout to Keeley for the doodles I just had to include hehehe

Fortune is going on a tour in this book AND SO ARE WE 💘

If you’ve ever uttered “come to Florida” or “come to Chicago” or “come to Texas” or “come to Arizona” or “come to LA” or “come to Utah” etc etc etc, we heard and we’re on our way (in about two months’ time)

Nationwide special guest authors will be announced soon for every stop, but tickets are now available!!! all tickets include your copy of Foul Heart Huntsman and access to get your stack signed… I’m also putting together something very cool to bring to each stop ✨cough cough art cough✨ so you will be in for a treat

(Although my initial plan was to get a life-sized Orion cut-out but that was “unviable” and “impossible to travel with”…)

Last but not least there may be more announced… maybe a stop more north… stay tuned…

Enyway, I can’t wait to celebrate the conclusion of the Secret Shanghai world with everyone 🫶🏻 it’s been a long time coming…
no [blank] hints anywhere

this photo is from july 2019 aka the last time I was in the UK aka four whole years ago… it feels like just yesterday I was being attacked by english seagulls…

anyway that was a segue to say I am re-entering the embrace of the united kingdom to launch Immortal Longings and chat with amazing authors and sign your book stacks and confuse waiters with my new zealand-american hybrid accent I’M VERY EXCITED

all events are almost sold out as we reach the final hours so if you’re planning to come along please snatch your ticket asap to avoid disappointment!!! muah muah muah can’t wait to see your lovely faces 🫶🏻🫶🏻🫶🏻

first day of UK tour started with champagne… (and the champagne kept flowing)

this whole week has been an utter joy, a whirlwind, a scrumptious feast etc, all with thanks to beautiful team hodder and my extraordinarily talented convo partners and the readers who popped in to join us every night, many of whom have arms of steel given the STACKS you’re carrying

thank you, I adore you, I’ve loved getting to chat and sign and evil giggle, and I can’t wait to come back😙
unboxing final copies of 🏹FOUL HEART HUNTSMAN🏹 from @simonteen but really it’s just me making weird noises for 90 seconds

only five weeks to go until Foul Heart Huntsman AAAAAAAH

so it’s time for a reveal… this GORGEOUS work of art is by @imedmi and I’ve truly been bowled over by the talent… (+ those two mysterious figures in the background holding pinkies 👀)

Very Importantly, these art prints will accompany ✨all preorders of Foul Heart Huntsman from @astoriabookshop ✨ (see second pic for my mock-up, I tried my best in photoshop) AND they’ll come with your ticketed book for all Foul Heart Huntsman tour events, while supplies last 🎟 if you’re planning on attending a tour event, snatch your ticket asap to get one of these!!!

While I would love to make this available as a general preorder incentive, please know that I’m distributing these entirely with mine own two hands which is why they’re available either at my local indie (so that I can slip the prints in while I sign) or at the tour stops (so that my publisher can help coordinate them ahead of time). similarly to the preorder campaigns for These Violent Delights and Our Violent Ends, I am sending the art out from my bedroom so I realistically can’t open this up to all receipts, or else I’d become buried under envelopes and postage stamps, and I truly am sorry for that! if you’re based internationally, Astoria Bookshop does ship worldwide, and I hope there is some way to get this print into your hands 🤲🏻✨

my events page (in bio) will have more info + all tour stop info!!

one month until release!!! (AND SWIPE FOR A TITLE REVEAL)

now that the caption has lured you in to wonder what this title is for, let me take you through some of the ✨Foul Heart Huntsman Exclusive Editions✨ and all will be unveiled…

first we’ve got the gorgeous @waterstones exclusive, featuring art beneath the dust jacket 🫀 it’ll glimmer like you’ve never seen glimmering before AND match your Waterstones Foul Lady Fortune 🧪

then we’ve got the beautiful @barnesandnoble exclusive, featuring a sweepstakes for anyone who has preordered this edition!! (yes even if you preordered it way way way back) 

the B&N Edition not only has a slight cover change (the art deco detailing!!!!!) but also a BONUS SHORT STORY which serves as the epilogue to end all epilogues. I kid you not this story came up to almost 40 pages, and if you hunt down where this title came from, you might be able to figure out what this bonus story is about 😉 (AND I’M SO EXCITED FOR YOU TO READ IT)

as always, if you want to support indies, you can get signed and personalized editions from Astoria Bookshop, go to thechloegong.com/fhh for more info!!! 🫶🏻🫶🏻🫶🏻

four weeks to go for a conclusion four years in the making, what the heck 🥹

if you’re in New York, Florida, Chicago, Texas, Arizona, LA, Utah, St Louis, or Toronto, COME CELEBRATE ON TOURRRRR 👹👹👹 (snatch ur tickets asap, it’ll get very exciting when the special guests are announced 🫶🏻)

finally: a definitive guide to answer all your “can I read Foul Lady Fortune without These Violent Delights“ YES “when do I read the novellas” AFTER FOUL LADY FORTUNE “are the original cast in Foul Heart Huntsman” YES “will I be confused for Foul Heart Huntsman if I’ve only read Foul Lady Fortune” NO YOU’LL BE FINE EVERYTHING IS EXPLAINED, THERE ARE JUST EXTRA TREATS FOR TVD/OVE PEOPLE BUT YOU’RE NOT MISSING ANYTHING

okay I hope that helps, love y’all🥰

tour news!!! (and a 🇨🇦 surprise)

omg foul heart huntsman ending leak!

Foul Lady Fortune paperbacks!!!🌸

this was supposed to be a “I’m so pleased to have my third child in floppy form” picture and instead I couldn’t help the “please for the love of god let me sleep for a thousand years” posture

the beautifully shiny paperback is on shelves in the US on ✨September 26✨… the same day as Foul Heart Huntsman!!! so you could make one trip to the store to grab both, or if you want B&N to throw either onto your doorstep, it’s the last day today to get 25% on any preorder from @barnesandnoble okay that’s a STEAL

swipe to the last picture to see how I’m feeling that we’ve entered YA protagonist age on the countdown to Foul Heart Huntsman (18 days…💀)

two weeks until final secret shanghai release and my heart rate is permanently elevated but it’s okay because that’s sooooo on theme

if you want a Foul Heart Huntsman that I’ve personalized (and maybe dropped, given my hand-eye coordination and how thick this book is) Astoria Bookshop @astoriabookshop is the go-to place to make requests and get signed copies!!! they ship internationally, and we’ve never encountered a request we couldn’t make happen, even if you’re asking me to draw a whole renaissance painting using stick figures of the secret shanghai cast. for real. never back down never give up.

as always you can hop over to thechloegong.com/events for more info AND to get tour tickets in New York, Orlando, Chicago, Frisco, Austin, Tempe, LA, Orem, St Louis, or Toronto because… two weeks to go!!! AAAAAAAAAAAAA👹

UK copies of Foul Heart Huntsman (right) have arrived to join their US counterparts (left) which means the set is complete. the prophecy is fulfilled. the family portrait has been taken (swipe to last pic). the secret shanghai universe looks sooooooo good together, I can’t wait for them to be united on your shelves too in 10 days 🫶🏻

somehow there’s ONE WEEK until Foul Heart Huntsman is on shelves… that’s sick and twisted. for me. and you all, I suppose

if you want your Secret Shanghai collection completed a tad early, I’m giving away 5 signed copies ‼️ all you have to do to enter is 1) comment a one-line headcanon of what you think is going to happen in this book, and 2) sit back and relax when I pick the funniest winners in 48 hours

soon this universe comes to a close, but don’t be sad, at the bottom of every ending is something new and exciting 🫶🏻

as always, even if you don’t win this giveaway, you can get signed copies of Foul Heart Huntsman or any of my books available for purchase and international shipping at Astoria Bookshop, or if you live in New York, Orlando, Chicago, Frisco, Austin, Tempe, LA, Orem, St Louis, or Toronto: come along to tour and I will sign your copy with mine own two hands 👉👈
happy 1 year, my darling my daylight

Foul Heart Huntsman is on shelves today!!!!!!

I knew this moment would come and I’m still in shock that it has arrived… it’s like sending your children off to college to live full and fleshed lives and you’re so happy about it but so sad they’re leaving 🥲 BUT saying goodbye means an ending that I’m so so so excited for everyone to read, and new things in the horizon 🫶🏻

Thank you to all the readers who have tuned in for Rosalind’s story, the spin-off I had been wanting to write since These Violent Delights and the threads I had put in place after Our Violent Ends - she’s so near and dear to me and I hope you enjoy her greatest challenge yet alongside Orion, Celia, Oliver, Alisa, Phoebe, Silas… and some old ghosts lurking in the forests 👁️

my 6th child, the conclusion to the Foul Lady Fortune duology and the ultimate finale to the Secret Shanghai universe… welcome to the world 💘

me when we’re halfway through tour and I get to see your lovely faces and chat with amazing authors and hang out at cool bookstores 🫶🏻🫶🏻🫶🏻🫶🏻🫶🏻🫶🏻

only halfway left to go!!! after Tempe tonight, there’s Los Angeles and Utah and St. Louis and Toronto, so grab your tickets if you’re in the area before the day flashes by and time has slipped away from our fingers…….. tehe

this 🫶🏻 pic is from the new york launch where I got to celebrate with @ameliewenzhao who I adore to bits and pieces, thank you for completing my hand heart with me and chatting all about the heart (of the foul huntsman variety)😚😚😚😚😚😚

(soooo many more tour pics to come)

FOUL HEART HUNTSMAN IS A BESTSELLER!!!

truly what a way to end the Secret Shanghai universe… from the moment These Violent Delights came into the world, readers have showed up for opening week time and time again and I couldn’t be more grateful for your early excitement and theories and live read-alongs 🥹🫶🏻🫶🏻🫶🏻🫶🏻🫶🏻🫶🏻🫶🏻

thank you for adoring Rosalind and her crew… they wouldn’t be here without you 💘

[PRÉCOMMANDES] On vous dévoile enfin la couverture V.F. de “Nos fins violentes”, suite et fin de "Ces plaisirs violents”, ainsi que les magnifiques tranches teintées à motifs du relié collector ! 🥀

Nous avons conçu ce second volume pour qu’il soit parfaitement complémentaire au premier. Côte à côte, cette duologie sublimera vos étagères. ✨
Cette fois-ci, le rouge est la couleur majoritaire. 📕 Les motifs des tranches teintées sont similaires au tome 1 mais les roses seront noires sur un fond rouge. 

Sous la jaquette, retrouvez une magnifique couverture rigide avec un motif de dragon, emblématique de l’univers de “Ces plaisirs violents”. 🐉

Que ce soit pour son écrin ou son histoire, “Nos fins violentes“ de @thechloegong est au moins aussi superbe et captivant que sa première partie. 💖

Les précommandes sont d’ores et déjà ouvertes ! Voici les ISBN : 

- Relié collector : 9782385600013
- Broché : 9782385600006

Traduit par Jacques Collin, “Nos fins violentes” de Chloe Gong sera disponible dès le 30 novembre en relié collector, broché et e-book !
De notre côté, nous avons très hâte que cette suite arrive dans nos bureaux. 🔥

Résumé du tome 2 :
⚠️ SPOILERS⚠️ 

1927. Shanghai chancèle, au bord de la révolution.
 Après les évènements de Ces plaisirs violents, la situation de Juliette et Roma semble plus inextricable que jamais. La haine règne à nouveau entre eux. Juliette s'affirme comme l'héritière impitoyable du gang des Écarlates pour ne pas être évincée par son cousin, Tyler. Qu'importe si Roma doit la haïr pour ça. Le sort de ce dernier n'est guère plus enviable chez les Fleurs Blanches. Se sentant responsable de la mort de Marshall, Roma est à présent déterminé à laver ses fautes, même s'il doit pour cela tuer celle à qui il voue autant d'amour que de haine.  Pendant ce temps, Shanghai est en ébullition. Les forces politiques sèment le chaos dans la ville, tandis qu'une nouvelle menace surnaturelle surgit. Cette fois encore, seule une alliance des deux héros, plus éloignés que jamais, pourrait sauver leur monde de l'anéantissement.

the fhh tour photo dump ✍🏻

there was truly no better way to welcome my book child into the world than the enthusiasm I felt on this tour, so thank you to everyone who came along to a stop… somehow we did eleven events in ten cities in twelve days and I DIDN’T keel over so we celebrate the little victories!!! it was only achievable because of my beautiful publicity teams in the US (ily Nicole and Anna and @linds1ferris) + Canada (ily @cayleyisreading and @mackenzie_croft) and with each day in conversation with the coolest authors and literary icons at the most lovely bookstores 🫶🏻 thank you to every bookseller who stayed late while we got through the signing lines, I adore you!!!!!

I am now deep in the documents writing what’s next (2 Immortals 2 Longings + t0p 5ecr8!!!) so I will emerge when there is more to share 😺

also photo creds for the paparazzi pic to @theseviolentdelightss of course

YALLFEST is this weekend and I will be there with The Goods™️!!!

if you’re attending @yallfest and you spot me walking around please ask me for an enormous signed Immortal Longings poster, you can tell it’s super sexy quality paper by the noise it makes when you flap it around (while supplies last, and I’ll make it last awhile by being super sneaky… maybe I’ll wear a wig idk…) 

otherwise I will be signing and paneling, and each signing line allows 3 books per trip so hopefully I will see your lovely faces 🫶🏻 final image feat all my books, in case we forgot what I published this year (so valid)

hey ✋🏻 you there 👉🏻 you know what makes a great holiday gift❓🤨🙏🏻 SIGNED BOOKS!!!!! 😤✍🏻📝

with the efforts of my lovely local bookstore @astoriabookshop we can get my books to you worldwide in time for the holidays, just pop in your order on the Astoria Bookshop website and then make your requests in the notes (i.e., just signed, or signed to your name, or signed to your name and draw the cast of the secret shanghai universe around a christmas tree)

I’ll be going in to fulfil requests this weekend so get your orders in asap if you want it to arrive with plenty of time to spare… but I’ll also sign again in december if you need mulling time on whether you want to gift a trauma boxset or a fluffy boxset 😁

Immortal Longings is one of Amazon’s Best Books of 2023! 

I’m so very pleased that my adult debut is finding its audience because I set out to write this book thinking “how do I put the world’s most toxic situationship into a battle royale situation” and I’m glad that there are readers who find ✨mess✨ as entertaining as I do 😙 thank you to everyone for reading and following along with this chaotic triumvirate… hopefully there will be book 2 news coming (V)ery soon… any (T)ime now…

this anthology may be coming fall 2024 but I’ve been prepared for the cover reveal since halloween 2021

I’m SO thrilled to be contributing a story to FAERIES NEVER LIE, edited by the brilliant @zoraidasolo and @ncparker - they let me run entirely wild when I asked if I could set mine during the Tang Dynasty, following a girl and a tricksy thief during the annual Lantern Festival and I can’t wait to bring my version of faeries to you all 😉🧚🏻

get ready for “An Eternal Fire,” and if you look closely… you might see Nate and Tally from A Thousand More make a guest appearance too… 👁️👁️ FAERIES NEVER LIE releases September 24, 2024 — more info below: 

✨

Faeries Never Lie, the next young adult collection in the Untold Legends series edited by Zoraida Córdova and Natalie C. Parker, is filled with fourteen short stories to revel in, that center faeries of varying genders and cultures!

There’s something to be said for starting your first day in faerie boarding school, for chasing a faerie through Chang’an during the Tang Dynasty, for searching for the missing part of your throuple who may have run away with a faerie prince, for descending into madness after spending countless nights plagued by the same faerie dream—and much more.

Fly into this revelry filled with tricksters, lovers, monsters, and the like, in this exciting collection for those who love faeries and those who are experiencing them for the first time!

Edited by Zoraida Córdova and Natalie C. Parker, Faeries Never Lie features short stories from beloved authors Nafiza Azad, Holly Black, Dhonielle Clayton, Christine Day, Chloe Gong, Tessa Gratton, Kwame Mbalia, Ryan La Sala, L.L. McKinney, Anna-Marie McLemore, Kaitlyn Sage Patterson, Rory Power.

Cover artist: Julia Bianchi @jbianchi_illustrations

I’m in the Forbes 30 Under 30!!!!!!

I’m tempted to leave the caption just at that because those were some very cool words to type… but I’ll also say that it’s an honor to be listed among such stars and I’m excited to hopefully stick around for a long time to do exactly as I’m doing 🫶🏻 

(yes I did choose the picture that would make it look like I’m smiling at the @forbesunder30 logo)

it’s time for a december hiatus while I travel, which doesn’t mean I’ll be entirely offline but I’ll only be popping in irregularly since there’s less stuff to share and the year’s events have come to an end. my brain needs to touch grass, thank you for understanding!!!

anyhow while I’m offline I’m doing the next developmental edit of “IL2: Somehow It Gets Even More Toxic!” (not the official title) and dreaming up the future for my next YA. many fun things are Incoming, and I can’t wait for everyone to Perceive. woohoo see u soon xoxo

stay with my heart in three days, have YOU got it on your tbr yet 🧐🫵🏻‼️

this book is, as all tashie books are, filled with such care and tenderness for those that are deserving of love. I’ve been saying for years now that tashie writes YA contemporary at its very finest and this one is no different—and if you think I’m biased because it’s dedicated to me, I simply can’t help it that the besties for lifeys are talented okay…… 

anyway I adore this book, I’m so excited to celebrate its release (if you’re in New York, come to launch on Jan 4th at @booksofwonder I will be moderating 😈) and most critically: make sure u snag ur copy 🤌🏻
